column4: will i ever have any luck with the radeon driver working with TV out
if i had to buy a dell laptop should i go with the ATI card or the intel integrated gpu?
id say intel.  i cant stand ati support on linux
i currently have an ati card and i hate it
maybe save a little money too
yea bu i havnt used the intel integrated
so i wanted to get both sides
well there are still some great 3d games
i have an ati card and i got beryl running but if i want to watch a movie i have to turn it off
and TVout is a no go
b123 what card do you have?
asus has nice laptops with nvidia cards
have you gotten the TV out to work?
i have to get a dell
im on a budget and i get a huge discount with dell
i think i might look at S76 and just eat ramen for a lil bit
